column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////The Tonkotsu Spicy is my favorite. You get to choose your level of spiciness
column4: and hot. Because I wasn't willing to be too much of a daredevil
column5: I chose spicy. Spicy gives you a good amount of kick and allows you to be able to sip on the broth without dying of heat. I love garlic so getting the FREE fresh garlic is an automatic plus for me. We also got the Spicy Chicken Ramen. It was definitely good
column6: but the Tonkotsu Spicy was definitely the better one out of the two.
